dialog.selectWhisperModelMessage: Please select a .bin model file in GGML format

error.invalidPath: Invalid file path: absolute path required
error.relativePathNotAllowed: Invalid file path: relative path symbols not allowed
error.parseVideoFailed: Failed to parse video info: invalid response format
error.notAFile: Selected path is not a file

ytdlp.playlistNotSupported: Playlists are not supported, please use a single video URL
ytdlp.channelNotSupported: Channels are not supported, please use a single video URL
ytdlp.bangumiNotSupported: Bangumi/Drama content is not supported (copyright restrictions)
ytdlp.userSpaceNotSupported: User space is not supported, please use a single video URL
ytdlp.favoritesNotSupported: Favorites are not supported, please use a single video URL
ytdlp.festivalNotSupported: Festival/Activity pages are not supported, please use a single video URL
ytdlp.invalidUrlFormat: Unrecognized video URL format, please check the URL
ytdlp.unsupportedPlatform: Only YouTube and Bilibili video URLs are supported
ytdlp.networkError: Network connection failed, please check your network and retry
ytdlp.rateLimit: Too many requests, please try again later
ytdlp.youtubeRateLimit: YouTube rate limit exceeded, please try again later (wait 5-10 seconds)
ytdlp.accessDenied: Access denied (403), try updating yt-dlp or retry later
ytdlp.privateVideo: This is a private video and cannot be downloaded
ytdlp.videoNotFound: Video not found or has been deleted
ytdlp.ageRestricted: Age-restricted content, login required for age verification
ytdlp.geoBlocked: This video is not available in your region (try using a proxy)
ytdlp.paidContent: This is paid/premium content, purchase required to download
ytdlp.videoDeleted: This video has been deleted or set to private by the uploader
ytdlp.fanOnly: This video is exclusive to fans/supporters
ytdlp.unsupportedUrl: This URL type is not supported, please check the URL
ytdlp.formatUnavailable: Selected quality is not available, please try another quality
ytdlp.parseError: Failed to parse response, may be a temporary network issue, please retry
ytdlp.vipRequired: Bilibili VIP membership required to watch this video
ytdlp.paymentRequired: This is a paid video, purchase required to download
ytdlp.drmProtected: This video is DRM protected and cannot be downloaded
ytdlp.biliLoginRequired: Bilibili login required to watch this video

localWhisper.modelTooSmall: Model file is too small (may be invalid)
localWhisper.modelIncompatibleFormat: Incompatible model format. whisper.cpp requires GGML/GGUF format models, faster-whisper (CTranslate2) format is not supported. Please download a model in the correct format.
localWhisper.binaryNotFound: Whisper executable not found. Please check the path in settings or ensure the software is installed correctly.

preflight.geminiKeyMissing: Gemini API Key is not set, translation and refinement unavailable
preflight.openaiKeyMissing: OpenAI API Key is not set, online Whisper transcription unavailable
preflight.whisperPathEmpty: Local Whisper is enabled but model path is not set
preflight.whisperModelNotExist: Whisper model file does not exist, may have been moved or deleted
preflight.whisperModelTooSmall: Whisper model file is too small (may be invalid)
preflight.whisperBinaryNotExist: Custom Whisper executable does not exist
preflight.ctcPathEmpty: CTC alignment is enabled but model path is not set
preflight.ctcModelDirNotExist: CTC alignment model directory does not exist, may have been moved or deleted
preflight.ctcModelPathNotDir: CTC alignment model path is not a directory
preflight.ctcModelFilesMissing: CTC alignment model directory is missing files: {{files}}, please re-download the complete model or verify the model directory path
preflight.ctcModelInvalidOnnx: CTC alignment model is not a valid ONNX format, please re-download
preflight.ctcModelReadError: Cannot read CTC alignment model file
preflight.ctcAlignerNotExist: Custom aligner executable does not exist
preflight.ctcAlignerVersionTooOld: Aligner version {{current}} is too old for the Omnilingual model. Please update to v{{required}} or later (Settings > About > Check for Updates)
preflight.ctcAlignerVersionUnknown: Could not determine aligner version. The Omnilingual model requires aligner v{{required}} or later — proceed with caution.
preflight.binaryNotExecutable: {{path}} exists but is not executable. On macOS/Linux, ensure it has execute permission (chmod +x). You can also re-download via Settings > About > Check for Updates
preflight.ctcCompanionLibMissing: Required dynamic library {{lib}} not found alongside the aligner binary. You can re-download via Settings > About > Check for Updates
preflight.bundledBinaryNotFound: {{name}} not found. The installation may be corrupted — please reinstall the application.
preflight.downloadableBinaryNotFound: {{name}} not found. You can re-download via Settings > About > Check for Updates
